Viewposix.js Hardcoded URIInfo
 
INFO

posix.js Hardcoded URI

Source Code File
  node_modules\@eslint\config-array\dist\esm\std__path\posix.js
Vulnerable Line(s)
158

Description

It is recommended to avoid hardcoded URIs since its bad for portability across operating systems, testing, among other reasons.

Solution

Consider replacing the URI with a customizable property. Example: settings.getProperty("myApp.logFile")

Vulnerable Code

The following lines may need to be patched:
[Line 158]: * assertEquals(dirname("/home/user/Documents/"), "/home/user");
